name: About You
description:
A lonely house in a forest doesn't seem like a good place to spend the night, but sometimes you don't have a choice.

Can you get out of the secluded darkness of someone else's memory?

  • Controls

[A/D] - walking
[W] - jump
[Shift] - sprint
[X] - fight

  • Creators

Game Design/Story: Hey You
Art: elys1an

An entry for the $105 Adventure Game Challenge
